N5.名月: harvest moon (trad. 15th day of the 8th lunar month)
N5.四国: Shikoku (smallest of the four main islands of Japan)
N5.国学: study of classical Japanese literature and culture
N5.左前: wearing a kimono with the right side over the left (normally used only for the dead)
N5.年男: man born in a year with the same Chinese zodiac sign as the current year
N5.日時: date and time (of a meeting, departure, etc.)
N5.時雨: rain shower in late autumn (fall) or early winter
N5.月見: moon viewing (esp. during the eight month of the lunar calendar)
N5.長男: eldest son (may be the only son)

N4.七夕: Star Festival (held in July or August)
N4.下町: low-lying part of a city (usu. containing shops, factories, etc.)
N4.中世: (hist) Middle Ages (in Japan esp. the Kamakura and Muromachi periods)
N4.休場: (temporary) closure (of a theater, entertainment venue, etc.)
N4.作風: style (of a work, author, artist, etc.)
N4.出場: participation (in a tournament, match, race, etc.)
N4.出社: going to work (e.g. in the morning)
N4.出身: one's origin (e.g. city, country, parentage, school)
N4.出題: setting a question (for an exam, quiz, etc.)
N4.品質: quality (of a product or a service)
N4.場外: outside the hall (or stadium, market, etc.)
N4.夕立: (sudden, heavy) shower (on a summer afternoon or evening)
N4.字体: form of a character (e.g. simplified, traditional)
N4.家元: head of a school (of music, dance)
N4.年度: fiscal year (usu. April 1 to March 31 in Japan)
N4.教書: message (delivered by the US president or a state governor)
N4.書道: calligraphy (esp. Asian calligraphy based on Chinese characters)
N4.本館: main building (as opposed to an annex, outbuilding, etc.)
N4.来店: coming to a store (restaurant, bar, shop, etc.)
N4.母体: mother's body (esp. when pregnant or after giving birth)
N4.特急: (abbr) limited express (train for which a limited-express ticket is required)
N4.町人: (hist) chonin (Edo-period social class of town-dwelling commoners, esp. landowning merchants)
N4.病気: illness (usu. excluding minor ailments, e.g. common cold)
N4.発行: publication (of a newspaper, magazine, book, etc.)
N4.着用: wearing (e.g. a uniform, seat belt, helmet)
N4.究明: investigation (esp. in academic and scientific contexts)
N4.立春: first day of spring (according to the traditional lunisolar calendar, approx. February 4)
N4.色紙: square fancy cardboard, used for autographs, poetry, etc.
N4.花道: (kabuki) elevated walkway through the audience to the stage
N4.親書: official letter (from the Emperor, Prime Minister, etc.)
N4.計上: including (a cost) in a total calculation
N4.赤飯: red rice (beans and mochi) for auspicious occasions
N4.転身: changing (job, career, lifestyle, social position, beliefs, etc.)
N4.通院: going to the hospital for regular treatment
N4.運行: operation (of a bus or train service)
N4.野中: in the middle of a field
N4.開通: opening (of a new road, railway, etc.)
N4.院長: director (of a hospital, institution, academy, etc.)

N3.三権: the three powers of government (legislative, executive and judicial)
N3.上告: (law) final appeal to the highest court
N3.上越: area on Japan Sea side of Japan, including Niigata
N3.今更: now (when it is already much too late)
N3.件数: number of cases, incidents, items, messages, accounts, etc.
N3.使途: purpose for which money is spent
N3.供出: obligatory supply (of goods to the government, e.g. during wartime)
N3.元号: name of an imperial era (e.g. Heisei, Showa)
N3.入居: moving in (to a house, apartment, etc.)
N3.入所: admission (to an institute, nursery school, facility, etc.)
N3.入選: being selected (for a prize, exhibition, etc.)
N3.共演: appearing together (in a film, play, etc.)
N3.内職: side job (outside of one's main employment)
N3.出演: appearance (in a film, play, TV show, etc.)
N3.初夢: first dream of the New year (believed to foretell one's luck)
N3.初球: (baseb) pitcher's first pitch (to batter, or in the game)
N3.前頭: (sumo) rank-and-file wrestlers in the highest division
N3.動議: motion (i.e. proposal to a committee, etc.)
N3.原書: original document (not a copy or adaptation)
N3.参院: (abbr) House of Councillors (upper house of the National Diet of Japan)
N3.取水: drawing water from river or lake
N3.受験: taking an examination (esp. for entrance to a school or university)
N3.口数: number of words a person speaks
N3.同局: the said bureau (office, department, broadcasting station, channel, etc.)
N3.同席: being present (at the same meeting, occasion, etc.)
N3.同窓: being a graduate of the same school
N3.和式: Japanese-style (esp. in reference to squat toilets)
N3.和牛: Wagyu (any of four breeds of Japanese cattle)
N3.回戦: event with ... rounds, innings, legs, etc.
N3.在京: being in the capital (i.e. Tokyo, or formerly Kyoto)
N3.増発: increasing the number (of trains, planes, etc.) in operation
N3.大師: (Buddh) (hon) great teacher (i.e. a buddha, bodhisattva or high monk, esp. Kobo Daishi)
N3.寄席: entertainment hall (for rakugo, manzai, magic, music, etc.)
N3.居候: lodger who pays nothing for room and board
N3.山猫: wildcat (European wildcat, Iriomote cat, Tsushima cat, etc.)
N3.師走: twelfth month (esp. of the lunar calendar)
N3.年号: name of an imperial era (e.g. Heisei, Showa)
N3.店内: inside of a store (restaurant, cafe, etc.)
N3.式部: (Meiji era) official responsible for court ceremonies
N3.打球: (sports) hitting (a ball with a bat, racket, golf club, etc.)
N3.押入: closet (built into the wall, usu. with sliding doors)
N3.放水: discharge of water (from a river, dam, etc.)
N3.放流: discharge (e.g. of water from a dam)
N3.文相: Minister of Education, Science and Culture
N3.文部: (abbr) Ministry of Education, Science and Culture (1871-2001)
N3.文面: contents of a document (esp. of a letter)
N3.晴天: fine weather (i.e. little or no clouds)
N3.曲目: name of a piece of music
N3.書取: writing down from other written material
N3.月内: by the end of this month
N3.朝礼: morning assembly (at a company, school, etc.)
N3.末広: spreading out like an open fan
N3.本数: number (of long, cylindrical things, movies, trains, home runs, etc.)
N3.歳出: annual expenditure (of a state, organization, etc.)
N3.活動: activity (of a person, organization, animal, volcano, etc.)
N3.特産: being produced in a particular region
N3.理念: (Platonic) ideal (of how things ought to be, e.g. human rights)
N3.番付: ranked list (entertainers, sumo wrestlers, millionaires, etc.)
N3.神風: divine wind (esp. a typhoon thought to have protected Japan from a Mongolian invasion in the 13th century)
N3.福助: large-headed dwarf statue, bringer of good luck
N3.紙面: space on a page (e.g. in a newspaper)
N3.給食: provision of lunch (e.g. at office, school, etc.)
N3.自在: being able to do as one pleases
N3.舞台: stage (of a theatre, concert hall, etc.)
N3.草書: highly cursive style (of writing Chinese characters)
N3.落差: difference in elevation (between two points in a body of water)
N3.薬味: condiment (e.g. grated or chopped topping such as daikon, wasabi, ginger, green onion, red pepper)
N3.薬害: harmful side effects of a medicine or drug
N3.記入: entry (in a form, register, diary, etc.)
N3.越後: (hist) Echigo (former province located in present-day Niigata Prefecture)
N3.転戦: moving from one battlefield to another
N3.送迎: seeing off and meeting on return
N3.通過: passing through (a tunnel, station, town, etc.)
N3.連作: planting a field with the same crop each year
N3.週内: by the end of this week
N3.進出: advance (into a new market, industry, etc.)
N3.進学: advancing to the next stage of education
N3.適用: application (of a rule, law, method, etc.)
N3.選任: nomination (of a person to a position)
N3.部長: head (chief, director) of a section or department
N3.閉会: closure (of a ceremony, event, meeting, etc.)
N3.開局: opening (of a broadcasting station, post office, bureau, etc.)
N3.関取: (sumo) ranking wrestler in the makuuchi (senior-grade) or juryo (junior-grade) divisions
N3.関東: Kanto (region comprising Tokyo and surrounding prefectures)
N3.関西: Kansai (region comprising Kyoto, Osaka, Kobe and surrounding prefectures)
N3.音頭: lead (in a cheer, toast, song, etc.)
N3.館内: inside a library, museum, cinema, etc.

N2.一冊: one copy (of a book, magazine, etc.)
N2.三枚: three flat objects (sheets of paper, pieces of cloth, etc.)
N2.中卒: (col) (abbr) having graduated from junior high school (as one's highest completed level of education)
N2.中島: island in a pond or river
N2.中略: omission (of middle part of a text)
N2.九州: Kyushu (southernmost of the four main islands of Japan)
N2.乱立: standing close together in a disorderly way (of buildings, etc.)
N2.二枚: two sheets (of paper or other flat objects)
N2.余波: waves that remain after the wind has subsided
N2.入籍: registering (a marriage, etc.) in the family register
N2.分担: taking on one's share (e.g. of work)
N2.制圧: gaining total control (of people or counties)
N2.刺身: sashimi (raw sliced fish, shellfish or crustaceans)
N2.参拝: going and worshipping (at a shrine or temple)
N2.参照: reference (e.g. to a dictionary, passage, footnotes)
N2.収録: recording (in a book, the minutes, etc.)
N2.取材: gathering material (for an article, novel, etc.)
N2.号令: order (esp. to a number of people)
N2.国勢: state of a country (population, resources, etc.)
N2.地蔵: (abbr) Kshitigarbha (bodhisattva who looks over children, travellers and the underworld)
N2.大仏: large statue of Buddha (trad. at least 4.8m high)
N2.大根: daikon (variety of large white Oriental radish, Raphanus sativus var. longipinnatus)
N2.大粒: large drop (of rain, sweat, tears, etc.)
N2.安芸: (hist) Aki (former province located in the west of present-day Hiroshima Prefecture)
N2.布石: (go) strategic arrangement of go stones at the beginning of a game
N2.府県: prefectures (of Japan, excl. Tokyo and Hokkaido)
N2.彼岸: equinoctial week (when Buddhist services are held)
N2.復元: restoration (to the original state or location)
N2.復活: revival (of an old system, custom, fashion, etc.)
N2.担任: being in charge of (esp. a class or subject)
N2.担当: being in charge (of an area of responsibility)
N2.改選: election (for a seat or position at the end of a term)
N2.敬遠: pretending to respect (someone) while in fact staying distant
N2.数個: several (objects, usu. from two to six)
N2.本尊: principal object of worship (at a Buddhist temple)
N2.本籍: one's registered domicile (as recorded in the family register)
N2.満喫: having one's fill (of food or drink)
N2.物販: (abbr) sale of goods (as opposed to services)
N2.移籍: transfer (of one's name into another family register)
N2.立札: sign on a post (usu. wooden and with a small roof, containing information about a sight, warning, congratulations, etc.)
N2.筆順: stroke order (esp. of a Chinese character)
N2.総理: (abbr) prime minister (as the head of a cabinet government)
N2.肉薄: closing in on (the enemy, first place, etc.)
N2.講談: storytelling (of war chronicles, revenge tales, etc.) with highly dramatic delivery
N2.辞令: notice of personnel change (appointment, dismissal, etc.)
N2.農薬: agricultural chemical (i.e. pesticide, herbicide, fungicide, etc.)
N2.運航: operation (of a ship or aircraft route)
N2.駐日: resident in Japan (of a foreign ambassador, government official, etc.)
N2.高卒: (col) (abbr) having graduated from high school (as one's highest completed level of education)
N2.鳴門: strait with a roaring tidal ebb and flow

N1.一丁: one leaf (of a book bound in Japanese style)
N1.一環: link (e.g. in a chain of events)
N1.中旬: middle ten days of a month
N1.会釈: slight bow (as a greeting or sign of gratitude)
N1.併設: joint establishment (esp. schools of different levels or different courses of study)
N1.傍聴: listening (to a lecture, hearing, parliament session, etc.)
N1.克服: conquest (of a difficulty, illness, crisis, etc.)
N1.初詣: first shrine visit of the New Year
N1.南蛮: (hist) (derog) southern barbarians (name used in ancient China for non-Chinese ethnic groups to the south)
N1.博多: Hakata (old but still commonly used name for Fukuoka)
N1.合掌: pressing one's hands together in prayer
N1.名義: name (esp. on a deed, contract, etc.)
N1.固執: sticking to (an opinion, theory, belief, etc.)
N1.太刀: long sword (as opposed to the shorter katana)
N1.姫君: (hon) daughter of a person of high rank (esp. eldest daughter)
N1.存廃: maintenance or abolition (of a system, institution, etc.)
N1.官邸: official residence (e.g. of the prime minister)
N1.宛名: name and address (on an envelope, etc.)
N1.実刑: prison sentence (without a stay of execution)
N1.小結: (sumo) wrestler of the fourth highest rank
N1.山陰: place in the shade of a mountain
N1.平幕: (sumo) rank-and-file wrestlers in the highest division
N1.序盤: opening (in a game of go, chess, etc.)
N1.座禅: (Buddh) zazen (seated Zen meditation, usu. in a cross-legged position)
N1.弥生: (obs) third month of the lunar calendar
N1.往生: (Buddh) passing on to the next life
N1.徐行: going slowly (esp. to enable a vehicle to stop immediately)
N1.応召: (mil) responding to a call-up for military service
N1.応酬: exchange (of words, views, punches, cups, etc.)
N1.恩師: (hon) teacher (to whom one owes a debt of gratitude)
N1.慰霊: consoling the spirits of the dead
N1.憂国: patriotic concern for the future of one's country
N1.捜索: search (esp. for someone or something missing)
N1.掲載: publication (e.g. of an article in a newspaper)
N1.搬入: carrying in (esp. heavy objects, artwork, furniture)
N1.搬出: carrying out (esp. heavy objects, artwork, furniture)
N1.携帯: carrying (on one's person or in the hand)
N1.操業: operation (of a machine, factory, fishing boat, etc.)
N1.敵失: error made by the enemy or opposing team
N1.敷居: (archit) threshold (esp. one with grooves for sliding doors)
N1.敷設: laying (a railroad, pipes, naval mines, etc.)
N1.文系: humanities, social sciences, and fine arts
N1.日傘: parasol (esp. one carried in the hand)
N1.晩酌: drink at home with one's evening meal
N1.未遂: failed attempt (at a crime, suicide, etc.)
N1.末尾: end (e.g. of report, document, paragraph, etc.)
N1.条文: text (of a law, treaty, contract, etc.)
N1.枠内: within the limits (framework, boundaries, price, etc.)
N1.梅雨: (East Asian) rainy season (in Japan, usu. from early June to mid-July)
N1.棋譜: record of a game of go, shogi, chess, etc.
N1.検索: looking up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
N1.検視: examination of a body to determine if a crime has been committed
N1.検診: medical examination (for a specific condition or disease)
N1.沿線: places alongside a railway line, bus route, major thoroughfare, etc.
N1.浄土: (Buddh) pure land (esp. the Western Pure Land paradise of Amitabha)
N1.渓谷: valley (with a river running through it)
N1.源氏: Genji (the character in the Genji Monogatari)
N1.点滅: switching on and off (of a light)
N1.猫舌: dislike of very hot food or drink
N1.王侯: the king and his feudal lords
N1.直視: taking a straight look at something
N1.矯正: correction (of a fault, defect, flaw, etc.)
N1.神宮: high-status Shinto shrine with connection to imperial family
N1.移譲: handing over (of a right, property, etc.)
N1.突貫: charging (at the enemy) with a shout
N1.結論: conclusion (of an argument, discussion, study, etc.)
N1.義兄: brother-in-law (spouse's older brother or older sister's husband)
N1.義妹: sister-in-law (spouse's younger sister or younger brother's wife)
N1.義姉: sister-in-law (spouse's older sister or older brother's wife)
N1.義弟: brother-in-law (spouse's younger brother or younger sister's husband)
N1.聴取: hearing (of a statement, opinion, explanation, etc.)
N1.衆院: (abbr) House of Representatives (lower house of the National Diet of Japan)
N1.街道: highway (esp. one existing from the Edo period)
N1.貫通: passing through (of a tunnel, bullet, etc.)
N1.赴任: moving to a different location to start a new job
N1.遺品: things left (to one) by the deceased
N1.遺書: note left by a dead person
N1.長唄: long epic song with shamisen accompaniment (developed in Edo in the early 17th century)
N1.関脇: (sumo) wrestler of the third highest rank
N1.防疫: communicable disease control (e.g. by quarantine, disinfection, etc.)
N1.陣営: camp (supporters of a doctrine, party, etc.)
N1.随員: member of an entourage or retinue or party
N1.雑炊: rice gruel containing vegetables, fish, etc., and seasoned with miso or soy sauce
N1.雑煮: soup containing rice cakes and vegetables (New Year's dish)
N1.青柳: green willow (i.e. one that has budded)
N1.顕在: being actual (as opposed to hidden or latent)
N1.食糧: food (esp. staple food such as rice or wheat)
N1.駅弁: boxed lunch bought at a station (often a local specialty)
